flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: The method and techniques used to recreate a modern version of an arcade classic
guide.introduction_rendered: The method and techniques used to recreate a modern version of an arcade classic
guide.summary: The anachronistic technology Mutoscope is a computerized interpretation of the classic device.. What is a Mutoscope you ask ?  its a coin operated hand cranked flipbook that once littered the arcades, fairgrounds and amusement parks of America
guide.title: Anachronistic  Mutoscope
